document.full_text: kenyan olympic marathon champion samuel wanjiru plunged to his death from the first-floor balcony of his home after the athlete's wife found him in bed with another woman, police told reuters.
document.title: olympic champion wanjiru dies after fall
lines_and_colors: kenyan olympic marathon champion samuel wanjiru plunged to his death from the first-floor balcony of his home after the athlete's wife found him in bed with another woman, police told reuters.
